issue.title: [C++][Docs] Missing param docs for RecordBatch::SetColumn
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13459](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13459). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
RecordBatch::SetColumn as documented in <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/cpp/api/table.html#_CPPv4NK5arrow11RecordBatch9SetColumnEiRKNSt10shared_ptrI5FieldEERKNSt10shared_ptrI5ArrayEE
>is missing parameter documentation

comments.body:
